name: The Lands of Hyberian
description:
Welcome to The Lands of Hyberian. The kingdom of Tydrall is ruled by the king and queen. The King and Queen have claimed all The Lands of Hyberian. Never venturing outside the kingdom, brave knights are sent to aid against the threats of all creatures surrounding the lands. It is up to the brave knights of Tydrall to answer the kings summon! Prepare your training and bring your wisdom as the king seeks an audience.

The game takes you around the map in linear fashion battling creatures in an old style point and click RPG adventure experience. With a variety of spells at your disposal, quests to guide the player, and the use of strategy/tactics to defeat enemy types. There are choices on whether to battle creatures based on an integrated health, mana, and experience leveling system. Loot drops at random from creatures allowing multiple battles of the same creatures until possible to move onto the next scenario. A well thought out story driven experience will take you along the ride. Puzzles are another feature of the game mechanics to give the player variety and a break from all the combat.

The time to wait is no longer brave knights! Enter the Lands of Hyberian and claim your victory!
